title: The Weekend
description: The Weekend is the first book in the City Romance Series by new author L.A. Ritz. Bethany has traveled to the big city for one thing. She wants to lose her virginity. With the help of her friend, they set up the night. Yet things don't go as planned and Bethany's path takes a whole new route. A fun, endearing, awkward, smart, and crazy weekend leads Bethany to unwanted love and a man who will make every woman drool. This is the first book of their love story. Each book will take place in a new city. So follow Bethany as she goes from Seattle, to Paris, New York City, and home in the vineyards of western Washington. ***Note that this is book catered towards adult readers. 18*** Which involve steamy, descriptive love scenes.
author: L.A. Ritz
